1217270.name: KemonoMix Re
1217270.description:
『Kemono Mix Re』is a exploration, monster-raising simulation game where you nurture local lifeform called 'Kemonos' on a mysterious alien planet.

Discover over 60+ Kemono species. Mixing Kemonos together, make your very own Kemono!

▼ Raise your Kemonos and explore the planet

You were assigned to explore a newly discovered planet, but parts of your ship were lost during your rough landing.

With the help of native Kemonos, gather the missing components scattered across the planet and prepare for your journey back to Earth.

▼ Power up your Kemonos by training!

Use five different training courses to power up your Kemono's stats!

As your Kemono gets stronger and stronger, the more they can support you on your expedition.

▼ Explore the planet to get items and meet new Kemonos!

During your expeditions, you’ll uncover various items and encounter wild Kemonos.

Capture wild Kemonos in Battle! add them to the mix!

▼ Mixing your Kemonos for unique transformation

By mixing your own Kemonos with the ones you captured,

they will gain new appearances and powerful abilities!

As you experiment with countless combinations, you might even create something ...... special?

Keep on mixing, raise all kinds of unique Kemonos!
1217270.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 日语

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
